plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow ForkFriends to confirm you're near the restaurant so hosts can seat you.
plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ForkFriends to confirm you're near the restaurant so hosts can seat you.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ForkFriends to use the camera so you can scan QR codes quickly.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow ForkFriends to access the microphone when recording video.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ForkFriends to save QR codes to your photo library.
